comments: Champion's winnings & consolation amounts matched to the North Valley Community Foundation.

final_jeopardy.answer: (2 of) Buenos Aires, Bogotá, or Lima
final_jeopardy.clue: 2 of the 3 national capitals on the continent whose metro areas have more than 10 million people
